data.name: Hiroshi for Boobs 'em up
data.detailed_description:
Hiroshi is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. He has a very handsome body. Do you think he has more chances to make a good career as a gigolo? Do you want to try how good he would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages. By default the male organ is Off, but in the settings room you can turn it on and switch between the different available organs. When you will play with Hiroshi you will also get him as Steam Achievement.

Hiroshi was born in Chonburi, Thailand, his parents owned a small hotel on the beach and he was helping them a lot when he was at school. His parents thought that he will continue working with them after he finish school. But Hiroshi had his own plans. He attended college for commercial art and advertising and was ready to open his own business, but he needed money.

Hiroshi's friend adviced him to try himself as en escort, and they moved together to Bangkok. For three years Hiroshi was working as en escort and 5 more years as a male stripper. He completely forgot his idea to make his own business, he was ready to continue working in the adult entertainment industry.

Hiroshi has been married three times, and divorced three times. After the third divorce he understood that he doesn't want to spent all his life with the same woman, he need a lot of them.

Now Hiroshi is working as a gigolo.

So, help Hiroshi to take his place on the street!

data.short_description: Hiroshi is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
